name: Shave Master
description:
Become the greatest barber of all time!

Try to uncover them all, from lumberjack to a fresh cut!
Cut and trim beards to absolute perfection!

Do you have what it takes to be the best of all time?

Can you keep up with the customers' demands and make your way to the beard trimming stardom?

Beard + Trimming = Profit!
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
